name: Puppy Rush
description:
A game made in 3 hours for Trijam #178: The 3 hour game jam.

The jam theme is: Get that thing away from me!

Your friend came for a sleepover but your puppies wants to play!
Keep them away from the bedroom for as long as possible.

To play press SPACE or CLICK  / TOUCH anywhere to push the puppies away.

Credits
Art & Code: by me (Sunetraalex)

Music:
"The Fun Run! - Day 3" by Zane Little Music

SFX:
"Dog sounds" by pauliuw
"Voiceover Pack (40+ lines)" by Kenney.nl

Font:
Leckerli One by Google Fonts
